评论(comments):
[{"replys":[],"com_type":"","com_level":"50","com_likes":"7","com_menus":[],"com_spend":"","com_stars":"四星","com_author":"Wyjbb1217","com_photos":["http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/yOvz_Igh3Au_MUFYEJBllrABvZDqj6wBYmkpTaoL7IcnG90Lc9InM-TSuRIr7O8gTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/YoPohxw809CG01MLKgbtm2DRTJbG4uompukqvAmsCAaxACO8hNECLUNaAICf4EAKTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/_EoptNRJ-XnhGWL-UZmlAwDgyjCczNaa8OHXT0cdUF5YSwWp787JWsI2aFeJAkNMTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/HGWSPTuMAh6qEYquF8D92EOJsPugB5bqfrUWVYLJ00k3uebbdWqQy5JPdEUcWhUbTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/0ipjPHlBerUlUapVWod5Qp6C1spxApwjmcdog_ZREg5WzN_4hUPhHPENFzwE2h71TYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg"],"com_replys":"0","com_content":"怎么大众点评把我就归类为爱吃火锅的那种呢？其实我属于只要是好东东都爱吃的类型哈哈哈。好吧就迎合点评，在写一篇涮锅类，这次写海底捞火锅（西湖道店）。
不知道神马时候起天津开始出现海底捞火锅，而且越来越多，好像陆陆续续的开了有三四家了，可是我家附近就没有，唉！！！虽然没有但我却吃过好几次，再次强调我不属于吃货类！！！
通过多次的品尝，对海底捞还是有了一些了解，它是个全国连锁的火锅店（总公司在四川，全称叫四川海底捞餐饮股份有限公司），成立于1994年吗，原来只是一个不知名的小火锅店，但现如今通过艰苦创业、不断扩张，已经成为大型企业（好像有好几万人给它打工）。我在北京、沈阳、石家庄和上海都曾经光顾或看见过海底捞的招牌。好像还在中央电视台看过它的专题报道，“扬言”要以四川火锅为契机，打造川味文化。
在说说西湖道店，离家真心的很远，但是因为老婆的表妹在那住，并且她们还是闺蜜类，所以两家经常来往，再因为知道我这个当姐夫的爱吃火锅（为神马都认为我爱吃火锅！！），所以吗，我也是西湖道店的常客。要说它家的特点我就是总结一是物美价廉，五六个人吃饭吃到撑得慌也就三百多吧，又是肉、又是虾、再来点蔬菜豆腐类，整整一大桌子。对于各种锅底，我都能接受，不管是辣的还是不辣的，全去，小料自助这点我喜好，因为老婆大人调料是个高手，但唯一我不太喜欢的每次吃完身上总是有股火锅味，让人一闻到就说，你又吃火锅了吧，汗颜呀！！！","main_note_id":"344589201","com_author_id":"53723651","com_contributes":"2000-4999","com_publish_time":"1493049600","com_author_avatar":"https://p0.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/fdee11bcc439ef4210ec324a8d567b4025872.jpg"},{"replys":[],"com_type":"","com_level":"40","com_likes":"5","com_menus":[],"com_spend":"","com_stars":"五星","com_author":"guili_zhao","com_photos":["http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/DD8LIks9wZGaAf--EmBwh2B_4dp4ADjDW5LEoaE-WAt7gfXV4ouS0gg576jG6eq7TYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/femBps3UiOHrXtCfnKPKO9G3LP3ktrSlKxyrMI3tWxqo8zKMbxQfP7mB7PvwluCLTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/mCuJZR8aaTcDXZwFW0COlBuqYAfwda59Z3UJgkE4sI4pJ36aly4bqURKSnWlKZwiTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/eel0MG25L9MN2drcHgXGmtZUlDtBc2-rLCau75XiVbkt-HQzlOY35ADlO6UZvd_rTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/4alOzkdE4FyQojZOdKsOoaB5npgNJnhoTs_tfJJvbmvRKFpYEo6H3OpKaU98Sy8-TYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg"],"com_replys":"0","com_content":"?海底捞，一直被公认为是火锅中的极品。一直以服务优而著称。我算是海底捞的忠实粉丝，更是几乎吃遍所有海底捞火锅店，经常光顾的要数西湖道店了。离家稍近，地下车库停车方便。
?吃火锅最讲究的就是锅底，海底捞的锅底也是最有味道，最喜欢香菇锅底，先喝汤再涮菜。菜品齐全，且新鲜，小料也是根据自己口味调配。每每必点虾滑、墨鱼滑。唯独不敢点的是腐竹，因为有过两次点的腐竹不新鲜的经历。大热天菜品不新鲜也难免，主要是两次和店员提出，经理都主动来给推掉、赠送菜品，全餐打折，搞得我实在不好意思，貌似每每要吃霸王餐的模样。所以省的麻烦，这两次之后再不点腐竹了。这也说明海底捞的服务的确是厉害！即使有问题也让人无话可说。
?海底捞另外一个吸引我的地方就是，可以把小朋友寄存在淘气堡，大人们可以专心吃饭聊天，孩子们有自己的玩的也不无聊。","main_note_id":"345764426","com_author_id":"19274532","com_contributes":"400-999","com_publish_time":"1493568000","com_author_avatar":"https://p0.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/e3563b42cf65cd335ee7139151df694a6124.jpg"},{"replys":[],"com_type":"","com_level":"45","com_likes":"2","com_menus":[],"com_spend":"","com_stars":"五星","com_author":"dpuser_33551662419","com_photos":["http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/cSdRM_wfWsc_6zlTNiwOwGXCIsfrfKfPRsrHe0aSSM1l4jazCKjwcTmk2BzyUGKZTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/SM3E1ohzMo5WUcoPUh-yB1wEZjjOtAUGl0rMGWooxmPNRkPF4P-002uboxXAK6aSTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/8DyyxbjTXnoP_gJe3MXeZapACeh4VXPyg7-7-94C5eEVk5nAfHAPx8IWJ2s9eMvZTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/8EwJM3VPEqUI7-v5FxZw88uPdUMRZAf_ltxXuhk2KDxdo_J2BOAVauavBqpBqhsJTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/NKnE32yF78J057YcRbx7HDlFaF1gpUbhmoM-yCFeiDbbMF6JuBDWN8BUF4VB5oV5TYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg"],"com_replys":"0","com_content":"母亲节这天晚上全家来到了西湖道店的海底捞火锅，店是一层楼人很多直到我们吃完走时外边还有很多等位子的了，实在是太火了，这里的水果和拌菜是免费的，西瓜?很新鲜很甜很受欢迎，服务员不停的在上货，火锅小料品种很多不同口味的可自己调个人喜欢的口味，我们点了羊肉牛肉和蔬菜，有血豆腐,金针菇猪脑等等，女儿送了鲜花和亲手做了蛋糕?总之母亲节过的很快乐！谢谢我的小棉袄?","main_note_id":"348074649","com_author_id":"122284269","com_contributes":"1000-1999","com_publish_time":"1494890340","com_author_avatar":"https://p0.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/6da3f1b664847f502177fce2db0b98fa3333.jpg"},{"replys":[],"com_type":"","com_level":"10","com_likes":"1","com_menus":[],"com_spend":"","com_stars":"五星","com_author":"晴天snow…","com_photos":["http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/PeYmlvYdDz7MTxld8zUogf_RNPDwSROCY7-VCCnMYfpAKfd8v_cYdaBtyuCwaBBnTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/mKOOzgne3Il70G3bv4lLY9mCcACSdXbewmKkD8OsInV7gfXV4ouS0gg576jG6eq7TYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/gdT1NFpKrTqeoe88EZDIAkXP_0LjBhfgh4HefvQTrBjU3SC5nxN0XdtGwXSP-AT1TYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/TBgxOGO9JpMF5jeV0slY-eMc-QvHufJnRavPCmo34e12SeVPxYiBbM28Vna3fVQyTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/eLKgk2c8osjirTwyfOPbn_CSAN7rdvz4Xw8wIj8U1ytVVU6wF2bYNPt44c6vLqYkTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg"],"com_replys":"0","com_content":"海底捞不是一次两次去啦，今天喝老公还有一个朋友小聚又选择了海里捞，说说我在海里捞用餐的感受。
首先，我出电梯到坐在座位上，一共有3位员工带领我们，虽然中途带我们的人有交接但是我们的脚步并没有因为不是一个人从头带到尾而停留。没有不受重视没人理的情况。
第二，为我们服务的小哥，非常棒！对我提出的问题液给啦很圆满的解释。我刚坐下就有热毛巾，并且服务小哥给提供啦围裙，并且很细心的提示我穿得白底的衣服还是围上点好。而是他不是只负责我这一桌，可当我走需要他帮忙的时候他第一时间就帮我完成。我问了他的名字，叫韩小君，希望店家看到能给予奖励。
第三，不得不提的是这家店的洗手间，没有异味，厕纸，擦手纸充足，洗手台，洗手间地面都很干净，没看到阿姨，地上却没有水渍，而且洗手台的的客用品真的是太齐全了，除了木梳什么常见返的以外，还有漱口水，擦屏纸，而且这个时间东西很全很充足。
我觉得到这里用餐是很好很舒服的体验，还会来的。","main_note_id":"344980141","com_author_id":"821627665","com_contributes":"50-99","com_publish_time":"1493308800","com_author_avatar":"https://p1.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/bd258f59fb86d7a5490705ab2f7e15c778459.jpg"},{"replys":[],"com_type":"","com_level":"30","com_likes":"1","com_menus":[],"com_spend":"","com_stars":"四星","com_author":"lanlandedipanye","com_photos":["http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/PN_ZfntDJCQ8gEoBGy5W6PHJ6RczomLDyr1Uln_w32LwL1x2rL0irjObX8s7CRNdTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/i0AbBSjIM8Hwu19Q9yB2R4WQionwnic6wlchqPXc9mI4o8adQVW20GjZZOVcw59VTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/c0C1XalNldcm0yDRhNouSrgf_ON45EKav-m0vNpechPpCJCQfDNJ3Co_QXOsSLOhTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/tJas4t9AQO-91tDlcTC4fwJ79s3eXhsZoZk6FDcnWiI0GSpeZd7rboFXCOvwxgMCTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/Yp8OI0Kdn8gqbhN0CNejwBxr4Xqsv063LWKEXgspq33xuwTZJkFZTzgJqRAL1E5dTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg"],"com_replys":"0","com_content":"那天晚上不太饿就去海底捞吃点儿菜。服务真的好好，我一进去就给了一个孕妇大礼包，然后帮我放好后背垫子，杯子还给插上吸管…顿时觉得在这里用餐好开心呢。因为现在吃辣反酸，点了个菌汤和清汤的，服务人员好nice和我们说全是菌汤会贵些，这样一半一半会便宜。海底捞吃了好多次了，相信大家也都很熟悉了。这次最大的发现是，我觉得用小料台上的虾丸酱油作为蘸酱吃牛肉、羊肉还有青菜等等也都很好吃！有一种广式火锅的感觉，很清淡很清甜。期间还有表演川剧变脸的，我怕会吓到没有看，但大家都看的很欢快，用餐体验?！","main_note_id":"346656325","com_author_id":"30249393","com_contributes":"200-399","com_publish_time":"1494129540","com_author_avatar":"https://p1.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/8a72300fb4ebb74714c3af06a8b22aa521385.jpg"},{"replys":[],"com_type":"","com_level":"20","com_likes":"2","com_menus":[],"com_spend":"","com_stars":"五星","com_author":"就是爱angie","com_photos":["http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/CNAbFGDSqoQRsaV6W4EhLJ5JJBobSd8ufkl24LwJLvprPL75TC_Uon6JebO2efRtTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/ygUky7A0bF0D4_Vb2uum3i2-rL-8fh5dkSg9SePkGkoTsu-eL1pFIl8y1JR6Gd7YTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/Mbdyj7qw-idgyvJB_RrdKkm-53d0lK75susJxB6k3lClmg_HyTBMoAUrtPs9YqWsTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/dtykugVccZC66_L4t1AaAlnE7zkWTLv5yu1vO64vOZK02gP6n_pP8IiNC4YjV8AhTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/ynDxzwaZ9PepG4A35R4ks9LpeLufasTo3iG06CoN_pjwL1x2rL0irjObX8s7CRNdTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg"],"com_replys":"0","com_content":"去过NNN次海底捞了，上次写了一篇点评，主要说了说菜品，今天来说说服务～
海底捞以服务见长，当然厉害之处就在于把服务做到了极致，自然就会成功，相信去过的朋友都是深有体会，什么叫顾客至上体现的淋漓尽致～
起初不知道家人过生日，以为只是普通的聚餐，后来知道是生日，给订餐打电话，马上说可以给布置一下～
到了之后墙面有给装饰好，彩带气球，还有宝宝椅也准备好，小围裙，小餐具，小玩具也都准备完毕～门迎组的小丽更是来门口迎接，带我们去座位，服务超级到位～
服务员是个姓申的小帅哥，一直微笑服务，态度很好～由于带了孩子还主动让后厨给宝宝蒸的免费鸡蛋羹，很贴心～我要给菜拍照，就帮我把菜一盘盘从餐车上端下来，我拍完后再一盘盘放回去，一点没有不耐烦，超级好～后来小哥去表演变脸了，原来还身怀绝技啊，厉害厉害，表演结束还来跟我们和孩子合影留念，给个赞?
接替小哥为我们服务的是，姓吴的姐姐，服务细心到位，基本一直都是站在我们桌旁边，全程为我们服务，态度好，有眼力架子～最后看我们爱吃零食，还不忘帮我们打包回家吃，服务的太好了～
最最要表示感谢的是门迎组的小丽，因为今天不是分配到我们所在的区域，给宝宝玩具，安顿好我们以后她就去自己的区域了～没想到还给我们了个惊喜，推着装饰好的小车，上面摆着插着蜡烛的水果拼盘来给家里的亲戚过生日，一起唱生日歌，还给送了礼物，真的太太太感动了～还告诉我可以用点菜的ipad看到宝宝在游乐区的情况，我以前都不知道，真是人性化～
结账时被告知因为有人过生日，所以我们点的面没有算进去，免费赠送了，真的太太太太太贴心了吧，永远想在客人前面，大赞～","main_note_id":"342471428","com_author_id":"31131243","com_contributes":"100-199","com_publish_time":"1492173360","com_author_avatar":"https://p0.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/cc62196ee89874647dc7ce30f1a6390c2078.jpg"},{"replys":[],"com_type":"","com_level":"40","com_likes":"2","com_menus":["滑牛肉","虾滑","甩面","无刺巴沙鱼"],"com_spend":"￥85","com_stars":"五星","com_author":"筱媛er_420","com_photos":["http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/xtJi6zoEbeSf397sE4qHLZ6jtc39UW7Qe6KZluFo0zXYCMX9GcqM8WqJs9_-0BbpTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/UM60IIHqK6OoNtb2PmPAAm2_3DGhJx30tiLeBTna_sVAKfd8v_cYdaBtyuCwaBBnTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/ob5yhwBiZ7jbKQXm7zWRQk55-z0vs3ZyoQb-eBAYu9dW4zcMmE86gACFY5irlB1CTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/X3_RqkBIQHmFrSkgkijtAiYeU8onNNgttOHMELzysDWx20mSGk1zwOmSPq4NmzbbTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/oLMF6ROYIAHwV-lHtHp-_xgVIMoLlrt2gYrpydjyYqTebQ1Xh73AvSQjTEcG0qBNTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg"],"com_replys":"0","com_content":"几年前和朋友来过一趟后来一直想再去奈何老公不喜欢火锅这次跟爸妈带孩子出去玩儿刚好离得不是太远饭后就来这里吃了
不愧是以服务著称的地方服务那是一个没话说在大门口就有服务员帮忙引路坐下后帮忙倒水拿手机袋擦手巾看到我们带着孩子还送了孩子一个漂亮的小娃娃
口味也是没得说真的很赞捞派滑牛肉有点辣很好吃无刺巴沙鱼肉特别厚很嫩虾滑味道也很好服务员看到我们准备下锅主动过来帮忙各类菜品也都很好吃水果也都很甜
唯一遗憾的是用餐前忘了在美甲那里预约个号了没赶上做美甲好遗憾啊下次一定要提前登记","main_note_id":"341240769","com_author_id":"776870123","com_contributes":"400-999","com_publish_time":"1491321600","com_author_avatar":"https://p1.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/fe4a4aa0fba92d22523e582d88e308421499.jpg"},{"replys":[],"com_type":"","com_level":"40","com_likes":"0","com_menus":[],"com_spend":"￥80","com_stars":"五星","com_author":"weare伐木累！_624","com_photos":["http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/hKbDiFpCujo9CY2E-orOpoxAXA5-r5xeTdwxdajUvko7Wdo1EoLzO8el2VSGKNo4TYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/bO3lVe_L1PONpLc1sawlJhohVyiaiwydY-3cB4H2G_j15CS3Mbr0agNW1sB173_NTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/jIbLZxuftVx4m-3BdJ0RLoN2R5weBlfqRsni8BMw6ailQYCdP4TH53ryBRZS7fKNTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg"],"com_replys":"0","com_content":"比较晚选在24小时营业的海底捞，我们这群夜猫子也可以享受火锅?这种美食。锅底要的鸳鸯锅，很喜欢清油麻辣锅底，根本不用蘸料吃都超好味！点的招牌推荐都巨好吃。其中钟爱莲藕片哈哈，，给我们服务的小姐姐很热情也很漂亮哦?八个人花了六百多都吃的很好！","main_note_id":"346509078","com_author_id":"282735455","com_contributes":"400-999","com_publish_time":"1494000000","com_author_avatar":"https://p1.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/f60b9a51554fc14155abaaa228c6942e30745.jpg"},{"replys":[{"reply_author":"哆啦哓梦","reply_content":"认识啊！","reply_publish_time":"1493808120","reply_author_avatar":"https://p0.meituan.net/userheadpic/orange.png"},{"reply_author":"青苹果wp","reply_content":"认识啊？","reply_publish_time":"1492701240","reply_author_avatar":"https://p1.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/fd300f2fdc7dd9d8557a975d99d1e7b96107.jpg"},{"reply_author":"哆啦哓梦","reply_content":"左边是韩姨啊","reply_publish_time":"1492679940","reply_author_avatar":"https://p0.meituan.net/userheadpic/orange.png"}],"com_type":"","com_level":"40","com_likes":"1","com_menus":["墨鱼滑","秘制牛肉","千层毛肚","竹荪","笋尖","服务"],"com_spend":"￥100","com_stars":"五星","com_author":"青苹果wp","com_photos":["http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/wI6rttXaRaXOJfFzOwe2oBq1fxVGAb8lVAh3LSkqvbslBq9puvyWwN7oukWr8wwxTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/TSFIDOE1s6u0RWtLrci4quQ5PBumeJ4tJUXA9OVOaZQhuSekESNA004tSK8JcGpoTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/oI02RDGLBLvuHNvKF25UvItyC9fCQE_J-W9wHJ8jiWl26OumLF9IdO_66h-v18-5TYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg"],"com_replys":"3","com_content":"好久没来海底捞了很是想念，打月子期间就心心念念要点海底捞外卖，但无奈超出配送范围，最近终于得偿所愿。带着3个月大的孩子来，也真是没谁了。点了鸳鸯锅，要的番茄和清油麻辣的，好点了一堆菜，服务员直提示点多了，后来在服务员一再劝说下，除了肉都改成半份了，真是贴心，没有一点过度推销。除了招牌的秘制牛肉、秘制羊肉外，毛肚、墨鱼滑、竹荪、笋尖、红皮土豆都值得推荐。最值得赞扬的必须是海底捞的服务，看我们抱着宝宝，特地找了个相对安静的角落，又是搬来婴儿床，又是拿来小玩具，简直没的说，就冲着服务，我们还得来，这也是别的饭馆该好好学学的地方。","main_note_id":"340391710","com_author_id":"7161262","com_contributes":"400-999","com_publish_time":"1490889600","com_author_avatar":"https://p1.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/fd300f2fdc7dd9d8557a975d99d1e7b96107.jpg"},{"replys":[],"com_type":"","com_level":"40","com_likes":"0","com_menus":[],"com_spend":"￥100","com_stars":"五星","com_author":"爱吃炸鸡的少女田","com_photos":["http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/cCOEEWXT1d7BVyrQZAbrYalZiAEX8N_AC89JbCzhszDBEsfCGQirJpwXRyncBMGKTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/jBr1dCHdHJAH-raiOShbfyxpTv0-3XcIzl0IrRXVOcGViAhwi3EnjQ1hCPpfw-X0TYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/vcizNxtZrtwyX02-hA3JkwDKLJqJpww6MihXigxX1hhrPL75TC_Uon6JebO2efRtTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/WfdvHwZnHIThNWL-6_CsVtHFct0Pu8nE4D8dTGG5S6DLPB9uBIPGcdWwpZpZIbkYTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg"],"com_replys":"0","com_content":"家人小聚选择的这里，才知道这个店是天津的第一家海底捞，服务自然是没的说，还帮我拎很重的包，挺感谢的。味道依然很棒，辣锅的辣度我可以接受，菜量挺大的，选择的半份就够了，肉质细腻很腻，涮起来太好吃了，四个人吃的饱饱的人才三百出头，挺划算的，妈妈吃的非常高兴。","main_note_id":"349066359","com_author_id":"598961372","com_contributes":"400-999","com_publish_time":"1495296000","com_author_avatar":"https://p1.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/af57c60847098850201b9d656fb261b496786.jpg"},{"replys":[],"com_type":"","com_level":"50","com_likes":"0","com_menus":["虾滑","肥牛"],"com_spend":"￥100","com_stars":"五星","com_author":"7elevenpp","com_photos":["http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/JbB5UuXGcvRQ7W9hvf4FJaBlKWhfyv1LctfMRo5mBJOH61fr-g3xGka-k_pA73zUTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/N4YeB4SX9HxFWtfbMaEMJ--qNwqMKxFxBQ9_vnBz-F9v_c8s-MqzPDSezd3W9JXfTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/GcJWF93xHbR-tW427QHkgFW1DQECxR0jUXH5fufp4QWr8-4Ei9Xsl82pON8S3lLATYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/t-TDw3WfQ2b8IFect8dcd8u-zJK2Q3GoqA5F-SzFnKzJ-JMpgRkYwbGCsposq-WMTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg"],"com_replys":"0","com_content":"现在想吃火锅都会来海底捞，真心比其他家好吃，不是饭点儿过来的，人竟然也不少。

enus":[],"com_spend":"","com_stars":"四星","com_author":"琥珀艾美丽0101","com_photos":["http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/sYxyJl5PgTG8ceMDrCwJKgcFaOnF98IvU3QmJGrMCpsXKNwzfgiuxdswZL2PI7n0TYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/6oqnn5JQ67XDHYlD54Mya_79q0L0setK0swgIHEjyf1bnpM9T49yMmnt4yPiPxuwTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg"],"com_replys":"3","com_content":"送了个孕妇大礼包，要的酸梅汤一共就给到了两杯，其他都是自己到的白水，吃出个刷锅的绿丝给打了个88折，总之这回的服务不如上次好，两天前来的那个服务的小哥特别热心仔细，哄朋友孩子一起玩，他貌似叫憨豆，也不知道对不对反正那个小哥服务特别满意！最后感谢给我的孕妇礼物，谢谢","main_note_id":"349063460","com_author_id":"38241881","com_contributes":"200-399","com_publish_time":"1495296000","com_author_avatar":"https://p1.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/5a1cdba56029a66fa366ef128c456d8d35724.jpg"},{"replys":[],"com_type":"","com_level":"40","com_likes":"2","com_menus":["滑牛肉","甩面","羊肉","鸭血","可以刷卡","家庭聚会"],"com_spend":"￥100","com_stars":"五星","com_author":"溺水的青蛙","com_photos":["http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/bMmiIbfOjDBsZh5NLTkzCO0Oj1MNNuuQVMnqFX3wgvwEXDLgqdYkbuvgvsPMUAGUTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/QB7gKLYdYXjAMQU4Jg0XB2d6mDPo_06QZUnLE26rA3CROBY0eCgHe76uXOER_2DPTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/PAfEWlu_FQRTNSTdxDhYuCNd16_iICvDb3MBed-NKPnHshRnJiL-uU0GBrJrL3XJTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg"],"com_replys":"0","com_content":"每年来N次的餐厅却没点评过太失误了。说道说道。
天津所有的海底捞（除了万达店）都去过不止一次，算是海底捞的忠实粉丝。
环境：各个店都比较大，卫生很好，真找的话唯一有点点瑕疵就是人太多导致个别时候地面有点滑。
服务：海底捞在江湖上服务是各店的标杆，进店等候有零食、饮料、棋牌、擦鞋、美甲。就坐后有热毛巾、眼镜湿巾、手机便利塑料袋、围裙。有孩子肯定送玩具、孩子餐具、鸡蛋羹等，孕妇送水果、婴儿图画等等，过生日有长寿面或者水果盘等。不舒服会主动询问你给你拿药来。可能我是黄金顾客的原因，每次去都会有经理来送个干果什么的。超五星的服务不是吹的。忍不住点赞！
味道：加浓番茄锅底和减辣的清油锅是我们家的标配。滑牛肉、血旺等等都是每次必点。整体非常满意，食材非常新鲜。

A4Y0XuUt1Py4mZHT1UOmLowpVrKDpAU7ceEh3ADqnnDmTl4ClHrYoS_QTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/krUNH30Js22_NetpAjnQtv-ljv0R8cRLAuvJ4jNdwkjEWz-wsUVvVdRULWYkSDSzTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg"],"com_replys":"0","com_content":"家庭聚会，首选这家海底捞，一个是离家近，再有就是一如既往的服务品质好！菜品的味道一直都很好！而且过生日送了礼物，水果盘，还有那个特色抻面！这个要大大的点赞，受到重视心里自然开心！各个方面综合都很满意，消费起来自然也就舒服很多！这是良性循环！这种管理方式是值得推荐的！???图片是后来补拍的","main_note_id":"335782312","com_author_id":"32417990","com_contributes":"400-999","com_publish_time":"1488556800","com_author_avatar":"https://p1.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/7175cbf11b7cc1b54a4733082bd8811360130.jpg"},{"replys":[],"com_type":"","com_level":"20","com_likes":"0","com_menus":["滑牛肉","虾滑","甩面","豆花"],"com_spend":"￥100","com_stars":"五星","com_author":"Ever_jin","com_photos":["http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/C7p5F9BRbXEjcnmGVuXE8xk1X7SmFxVPOdHgj-UdNUjOtM_duoDpumH9QqblCmXLTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/hGrELeF36gL38aNFRiJYeGZmyNHG5QSS0C5FZUCgn76Tfv6TluQIfNN2hTAqQ18vTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/xXeMp9bMHyLvJqp6Nkcf3h5g12Fish5UjTgz2TF8198MrwsCdlMrDD4UG1f5lZj_TYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg"],"com_replys":"0","com_content":"最爱去的就是西湖道的海底捞，而且每个店的服务都是超级超级好、带着孩子去可以再淘气包里面放心的玩、有阿姨帮忙照料、家长们可以吃嗨了、海底捞的每道菜都喜欢、最爱滑牛肉嫩嫩的、腌制的味道特别好，还有豆花特别好吃，服务员们都特别热情、希望你们的店坚持下去","main_note_id":"346919533","com_author_id":"38025177","com_contributes":"100-199","com_publish_time":"1494172800","com_author_avatar":"https://p0.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/3db258228badea0b407154c28568141b8011.jpg"},{"replys":[],"com_type":"","com_level":"45","com_likes":"0","com_menus":[],"com_spend":"","com_stars":"四星","com_author":"你是一二三_7855","com_photos":["http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/oFvn4xt86o-BFJlls3dyp3jfTdJq08jH73EyPi6PA1ZCUbge5HlxwvWKA3naZwMDTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/xGAak7t5IhTKmTDmDqJNVz7Hz8SlxQNzaPm4mrdxbAOuvZAf8c-L-coEb-gy8TUUTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg"],"com_replys":"0","com_content":"上个周日去的。服务依然保持的很好，每个人都是热情洋溢。工作状态令人羡慕。其实感觉菜品方面并没有特别出彩的地方。但是好的服务弥补了一切不足，我想大部分人也都是冲着服务好去的。三个女的，一个男的四百多一点点，一点]剩。要是饭量大一点的，人均应该能到一百二三。","main_note_id":"348003110","com_author_id":"166974792","com_contributes":"1000-1999","com_publish_time":"1494777600","com_author_avatar":"https://p1.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/532b5f36ea2e8b40a9d66f1d1b9878e734405.jpg"},{"replys":[],"com_type":"","com_level":"45","com_likes":"1","com_menus":[],"com_spend":"","com_stars":"四星","com_author":"尤小胖","com_photos":["http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/ev65cWg4C5asZ0ZUPRkWv8M7SWMhvFwNyj5IjXkWrFJ3FBJMSLaCv8bY782i7uhfTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/5gxyFPX6WEOMFY685JhXBjZnEcZxrUG-jQCc9cX3fbBCuOLBp4VcPfUu7tXbiRZdTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/gIO57w727o-OtpZWrMJ2Uubvoy9g7ROq2gW4jF03RDqahzSSP1kagc2Gip8MYykpTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/zknaXeW1r3AwBzGK3bwJg2gZGZzKk_feLw5OWRxINkj-n0We3JAhTiwMlNzLxSMvTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg"],"com_replys":"0","com_content":"午饭和同事来海底捞，6个人订了个单间，单间有88的服务费，赠送一个干果盘，选的辣牛油配三鲜的锅底，除了常吃的一些菜品还专门给有特殊爱好的同事点了牛蛙，本来过生日点了一份面，结果最后居然没上，单间的服务员也不总在，今天服务确实不太好，还不如大厅了","main_note_id":"338583578","com_author_id":"90283671","com_contributes":"1000-1999","com_publish_time":"1489939200","com_author_avatar":"https://p0.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/a12a9b77565f05da3383d684d085a5d738561.jpg"},{"replys":[],"com_type":"","com_level":"5","com_likes":"0","com_menus":["甩面"],"com_spend":"","com_stars":"五星","com_author":"OHOand海鸥","com_photos":[],"com_replys":"0","com_content":"今天来海底捞聚餐，从工牌上看见有一个客户经理叫杨秋霞的姐姐好热情'，我们问了她好多问题她也是很耐心的回答，给我们的感觉也很亲切，我们也是干餐饮的，但她们的服务我们是真学不来，因为她们的服务是发自内心的，他们也是真的把客人看成家人，每回来海底捞都能学到不少东西，这的很感谢?????","main_note_id":"349226884","com_author_id":"1148424611","com_contributes":"0","com_publish_time":"1495468800","com_author_avatar":"https://p1.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/f297c32acb124fb22eaa43d6c54d50d872936.jpg"},{"replys":[],"com_type":"","com_level":"30","com_likes":"0","com_menus":[],"com_spend":"","com_stars":"五星","com_author":"大桓桓桓桓桓","com_photos":[],"com_replys":"0","co 评论(comments):
[{"replys":[{"reply_author":"zzyll96","reply_content":"并不可以?略坑","reply_publish_time":"1494311040","reply_author_avatar":"https://p1.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/e7bf4317bef91738c0fa82f504fba0bf1248.jpg"},{"reply_author":"backatone_1798","reply_content":"可以","reply_publish_time":"1493899260","reply_author_avatar":"https://p1.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/5f1ea80d7df6cdce4b7e185a966142383534.jpg"},{"reply_author":"zzyll96","reply_content":"问下  海底捞现在能用支付宝的蚂蚁花呗付款吗？","reply_publish_time":"1493344860","reply_author_avatar":"https://p1.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/e7bf4317bef91738c0fa82f504fba0bf1248.jpg"}],"com_type":"","com_level":"45","com_likes":"8","com_menus":[],"com_spend":"","com_stars":"五星","com_author":"sunshine滟dy","com_photos":["http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/9MtJTC_VswNpXZ6_5WvDOsiHtKpTACOqrC4opl6sNOQTsu-eL1pFIl8y1JR6Gd7YTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/1RHDZnQW0m4BwNubgMJE1g-rvK0niwtrKQ5lXuoUHdTtXX1i_3zJ1y9pEkJHH7_WTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/HYAC9sN3I7lEgHpcIFeSYtiDFnCb-1_KfcN6GgHuhTN2RzRjFYhj5njVYekTCwBvTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/DDaVHad6daV_23YLeFTp_-CaiLP_JCS-oeOPveVIcbUt-HQzlOY35ADlO6UZvd_rTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/TnlmXhW7YP3nhwUM5sOLugEoZG4Zlp4wnvvVG7PqJCLMXxXBYPumRYsIoSiRSdFNTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg"],"com_replys":"3","com_content":"在正式点评之前，我想先给服务一个大写特写的赞?
即便海底捞一贯是以服务出名的（味道是没有什么特别出彩的感觉）依然每次来都忍不住想要赞叹，很好奇海底捞老板是怎样给员工培训的。

地址：天津市和平区南京路吉利大厦6层～6层只有2家店，商场侧面直梯可以到达（专供特殊时段上下楼的两部电梯）

言归正题，图1是干净整洁且满满当当调味品齐全（至少20余种）的小料台。每一款喜欢不喜欢的调味料，你都能在这儿找到。
图2图3是我们今晚吃的一些菜品（这个嘛就算是比较平常的咯）但是现在有半分可选，能多吃好几样感觉很满足。
图4是服务员送给baby们的玩具～

肉类是怎么都不会煮老或是煮散的那种（向来不殖匀獾奈揖筒欢嗉悠缆哿耍┲皇茄蛉馀Ｈ獬云鹄炊家桓鑫兜溃ㄒ补治也换崆分）
虾滑Q弹软嫩，关键是吃了不会过敏，图3右边是虾滑，还是半分呢，一点都不显的少哈。

另外…麻辣的锅底，都不必蘸料就有咸淡，个人感觉辣汤底应该再清淡一点。毕竟不新鲜的东西才会用到重口味来遮挡。咸味重了会让人感觉麻辣锅底不够新鲜。
然后说下价格，【菌汤麻辣锅底】69元拼
一根舞面条4元（舞面小哥长得和刘烨一样好帅啊）
自选调料每人9元～（调料台还配有两款粥可以喝）
自助的酸梅汤饮料也蛮好喝的！每人4元无限畅饮的。

今天还有一个最大的感受是，海底捞服务一成不变的优秀，今天更是惊喜的发现海底捞店的排风好像增强了！以前吃完海底捞身上味道很大，无力吐槽的就被大家都知道你是刚刚吃了火锅。今天餐闭惊喜的发现身上几乎没啥味道的～

真的很不理解为什么会有人给海底捞差评。每个服务员细节都做的很到位，一说要做个手护，立刻就来人忙着打水，帮你洗手，还有擦鞋和打印照片等等服务。真的已经很努力了，过号了也不会作废，拿着过了的号来可以优先入座。

最后…我承认我是非常挑剔的（比如菜品之类的其实并不是都很喜欢）但对于海底捞，我还是想给你个大好评。","main_note_id":"342943984","com_author_id":"33089117","com_contributes":"1000-1999","com_publish_time":"1492271580","com_author_avatar":"https://p0.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/49970fc863eea296313f3fb651e4113c421423.jpg"},{"replys":[],"com_type":"","com_level":"40","com_likes":"1","com_menus":[],"com_spend":"","com_stars":"五星","com_author":"初心1100","com_photos":["http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/kAH3jygp5HntsKMg9-fCO8ND17UdcsestJ4ZoUxJlK2bQ3QAyS5ZgqVDp-olAAnOTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/N_nnC4FYHjwBuV8csvwhPn7Axt3AtB0pZg0MV2kXLbPj3BCsJw3apoGOxNj8GjSqTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/HWv9BLm0-f6ute6tExTFC-3cqBBehEyceqkBTqa5VoeR-cGlPlGk8jbX_vnKR2oNTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/CjGRGGlBNKS1CT0xBC2mej76Rg38rovg_kWCbGJ_p2nlYqSWmqjIiwl9I5e8aYsJTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/cU6jftnoglXNyCw2SRUoNd67814j3kubSYAgyGhLB_VmFsP-B-YPEFaHRXptTprHTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg"],"com_replys":"0","com_content":"海底捞在没去吃之前就总听别人说服务是超级棒，所以，在上周我们同学聚会就去吃了海底捞～到了才感觉到不是一般的好呀！貌似是我去的餐馆里服务态度算是好的了～每个服务员负责一些餐桌，分配不同的任务，去服务顾客。一旦发现桌子上有剩余的垃圾就随时收走，保持桌面上的干净整洁，还有好多不限量的水果和小吃及酸梅汤！真心感觉不错，在一定的时间还有演出，吊足了顾客的胃口，怪不得每天排队的人超级多呀！口味还可以，但不是最好的，我们吃了番茄的锅底还是不错的～色素添加比较少，都是番茄，好吃，和以前在别的火锅店吃的番茄锅底不一样，料很足，麻辣的也是真辣，里面用的不是干辣椒，貌似是泰国辣椒，新鲜的辣椒，吃的很过瘾，就是食材有点贵，不过我们六个人吃还算不错啦！每个人平均不到一百，还吃的饱饱的～挺不错的。以后有机会聚会什么的也来这～主要是对他们的服务真的是赞不绝口！","main_note_id":"347310312","com_author_id":"136835851","com_contributes":"400-999","com_publish_time":"1494492000","com_author_avatar":"https://p0.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/395a5b7cf8fda440f63f6566eb707b4b219643.jpg"},{"replys":[{"reply_author":"猫妖一枚","reply_content":"反正晚上肯定要排队！","reply_publish_time":"1493860260","reply_author_avatar":"https://p1.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/e1ac330cab85d51385535b3969b1b75f26627.jpg"},{"reply_author":"A._752919","reply_content":"这个时间去还用排队么？","reply_publish_time":"1493809020","reply_author_avatar":"https://p0.meituan.net/relationwxpic/d776e322d040d2f0cf952389e8cd06792104.jpg"}],"com_type":"","com_level":"20","com_likes":"0","com_menus":[],"com_spend":"","com_stars":"五星","com_author":"猫妖一枚","com_photos":["http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/-7UUITZbOaSMZW61LXOmiaUZURwdL7O1r8RfmSV4rx1l4jazCKjwcTmk2BzyUGKZTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/mMzc2So6pd2L7zh4DfjWDIAy1yhCBpQ0TKvBTj4TwLdmE5cTlkEghg4rwc6lZ2zyTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/UdOHp_7jcbZOxYEPa0HNylCbcPCiQDxo-CjXMx3Le0prPL75TC_Uon6JebO2efRtTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/f-NdZDktQ9D3Pfd-xZTwbBEYVjNQbSO79tpFS6qE34XEvud6kpFOWKITUPDAZ-kDTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/uPZ0f_IpqRxXba_9eUtYhpz6B5MGVc9LLqBDVYi7qaUrvkHyMac7eaNrOOmvIgmcTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg"],"com_replys":"2","com_content":"带妈妈来吃海底捞，选择比较正宗的吉利大厦店。排队大概一个多小时吧，因为等座的人太多了，所以没人给送小吃和饮料，都是自己去拿的，这点没有万达店好，不过也可以理解。中途一个插曲，我刚倒好了两杯饮料准备端走，结果一个服务员小哥走过来瞬间把我倒好的饮料拿走了，而且端给了别人，真是很郁闷！！！
还是辣旋风和番茄锅底，番茄锅底的汤还是那么好喝，最后还下了面条，放了香菜，简直是好吃到不行。拉面的小哥也是很帅很帅，还特意录像了。
油炸小馒头是我无论去那个饭店都必点的，尤其是爱死炼乳蘸着吃的感觉，这次只要了半份，吸取上次吃不了的教训，而且酥肉也没有吃，果然我是对?肉无法接受的。
牛滑也依旧那么嫩，久煮不老，这次要了一整份，真心好吃，感觉比虾滑更好吃。
羊肉没有尝，妈妈说很好吃。辣牛肉也是最爱，非常嫩，放在辣锅里非常爽。龙利鱼也是很新鲜，而且半份分量也不小，每次必点。
红皮土豆是特色，感觉比一般土豆好吃，但是没有红薯的甜味。第一次吃鸭血，真的被惊艳了，没有任何异味，跟豆腐一样嫩滑，真的是不错，以后会继续吃鸭血。男票都惊呆了，因为我是从来不会吃这些的人，居然这次吃了好几块，哈哈。
冻豆腐，海带，杏鲍菇也挺不错的，菜都很干净，杏鲍菇更好吃一点，海带不用煮很久就很烂了，冻豆腐就是一般般。
最爱吃玉米了，每次都要吃，而且煮在辣锅里，特别特别好吃，把辣椒的辣味都吸收进去了，吃起来太爽了，不过不能吃辣的小伙伴还是煮在别的锅底里吧，像我这样无辣不欢的妹纸，觉得没有比这个更好吃的！
菠菜，青笋，娃娃菜也是很干净的，都煮在番茄锅里，陪着面条，非常不错。
底料每次都说弄两份，一份是吃番茄锅的麻酱料，也会加一些辣油。另外一份就是大家常常说的香油料，用来解辣，不过我真的很少蘸这个，觉得海底捞的锅底没有重庆火锅那么辣，而且真心吃不惯。
水果一般，西瓜没有之前吃的几次那么甜，小黄瓜很不错，妈妈喜欢。
下次要吃四宫格锅底，可以多尝一尝别的味道。
海底捞的服务就不用说了，服务周到，而且很贴心，服务员付洋洋姐姐一直跑前跑后的帮我们倒饮料，加汤，拿小菜，真是辛苦了，赞一下。
最后安利一下，柠檬酸梅汤，就是要两片鲜柠檬放在杯子里，然后泡着酸梅汤喝，真是特别清爽，也避免了酸梅汤过甜的现象。
以后会继续来这里吃，火锅爱好者，停不下来。","main_note_id":"345144638","com_author_id":"122028732","com_contributes":"100-199","com_publish_time":"1493308800","com_author_avatar":"https://p1.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/e1ac330cab85d51385535b3969b1b75f26627.jpg"},{"replys":[{"reply_author":"一曲折扇情！！！！","reply_content":"哈尔滨快了，长春马上开了","reply_publish_time":"1495247940","reply_author_avatar":"https://p0.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/676bd447079d09ddc7c4a4aaf83e351e20739.jpg"}],"com_type":"","com_level":"30","com_likes":"0","com_menus":[],"com_spend":"￥120","com_stars":"五星","com_author":"suraily","com_photos":["http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/kA-0S-9MVTfrE4ryv5DgO3JhYzcVl1Ahlf_DJrRoRg2vfKHE67nJBl-ZP3TZ2_TTTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/_OmySXkK-wFx4zGaNv9RzuBXHigFumW-SyRGJR4IrA-EG8txXxaDN6fdPJUKRmNQTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/-f_5xRZ-WprDotb3XRu9yOchmxZIPMW7JcBT2QKR6hMq7pxVk7nzsiM7RumjiRGjTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/YZxFvoa4S61s8f-ddoRkh9AQe9YpnMEV3YsMFeC_GRJm2cIggjFEH_RcDG1HWAsVTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/1nHjUoR_TZjO9WpPun_pDlzIcz5yVLbPf1X_4qKKQxS20MwiZ1PnhLkFQaLXTOXwTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg"],"com_replys":"1","com_content":"没有什么是一顿海底捞解决不了的，如果有那就两顿
海底捞能让你心情down到低谷时，分分钟upupup开心到飞起来
海底捞的环境和服务不用说，总是络绎不绝的人还有贴心到爆的服务态度和理念。你没想到的东西，他也会为你考虑到
口味来讲，四个口味满足你对于火锅的所有想法，鸭肠毛肚七上八下在辣锅中翻滚，一口就high到飞起来，如果你能忍受舌尖上的挑战，油条，菜品，玉米所有你能想象到的都可以让它在辣锅内翻滚跳跃，再直冲你的舌尖，味蕾，感觉辣的刺激。油炸豆皮和番茄锅简直绝配，酸酸甜甜，吃完一个还想下一个。对于不能吃辣的小伙伴，菌汤还有海鲜锅底是你最好的选择。
只希望大哈尔滨开一家海底捞，决定做那里的常驻人口～","main_note_id":"348546267","com_author_id":"28247507","com_contributes":"200-399","com_publish_time":"1495123200","com_author_avatar":"https://p0.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/f430148d33c8b06d9a3dc38d95326f1a193983.jpg"},{"replys":[],"com_type":"","com_level":"45","com_likes":"0","com_menus":[],"com_spend":"","com_stars":"五星","com_author":"fujisann_spp","com_photos":["http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/BVdGJMJ7tFVo63UlTJTTySWSh6j1SFRQotY_d1bgCNNF-0yissx54CYggZKkmVktTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/IuKpSJ51yLIxhIOkTkL8VV0nCOhH7co5l48IQn9JNcA4OnA797ve0qcViZcSKwMVTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/9Xh-2JiA3K5C2vxsuWl8ORp0yuZnTa9dDVgtWQeeo_-x20mSGk1zwOmSPq4NmzbbTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/FYpbLeNG65XV7lYPvRXIxsp4RXGzUwHoyYq8X4he4CZdl2PSGM1_kJwSN2GQRCDrTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/XFTuj8zTpaQgRFkC6lEgMinsn_xAZcK6fTFCvvSY1KTMyPRMleaDSP-6WmQuJiv6TYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg"],"com_replys":"0","com_content":"海底捞经营了这么多年，一成不变的服务还是这么的好。真的给个大大的赞！现在市面上火锅店比比皆是可是我觉得海底捞真是领军品牌。虽然价格属于中高可是服务优势还是让食客络绎不绝，不得不佩服人家的企业文化。这次是朋友过生我们选择了海底捞，我们点的是4格，各种锅底味道都可以尝尝，店家还赠送了我们果盘。记得当年我怀孕时来吃过海底捞还意外收到了孕妇大礼包，里面有苹果?还有一张男娃娃的大画还有什么忘了，虽然东西不是特别值钱，当时收到还是特别开心的。","main_note_id":"345553751","com_author_id":"7397663","com_contributes":"1000-1999","com_publish_time":"1493563560","com_author_avatar":"https://p1.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/86413e1f6fc302bb00caedade2cf7e231351.jpg"},{"replys":[{"reply_author":"Oxygen_3731","reply_content":"我只知道有牛上脑肉","reply_publish_time":"1495588620","reply_author_avatar":"https://p1.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/2ced775bf09d133892f1ce65d53e01b832806.jpg"},{"reply_author":"穷奶奶叫小天QAQ","reply_content":"您好有羊上脑吗","reply_publish_time":"1495555620","reply_author_avatar":"https://p0.meituan.net/userheadpic/lemon.png"}],"com_type":"","com_level":"40","com_likes":"0","com_menus":["小酥肉","巴沙鱼","番茄锅底","肥牛","捞面","黑豆浆","滑牛肉","柠檬水","自助调料"],"com_spend":"￥91","com_stars":"五星","co 这次点了麻辣、番茄还有三鲜的锅底个人最喜欢番茄的超级浓郁好吃的一个锅底
之后点的捞派滑牛肉很滑嫩不过这个肉要煮的久一点巴沙鱼也好吃还有捞面什么的师傅现场表演拉面很厉害肥牛羊肉卷都好吃小酥肉我也喜欢
黑豆浆柠檬水酸梅汤什么的服务员也加的很勤
整体味道口感不错而且听说食材质量也有保障","main_note_id":"349085653","com_author_id":"830531397","com_contributes":"400-999","com_publish_time":"1495415040","com_author_avatar":"https://p1.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/2ced775bf09d133892f1ce65d53e01b832806.jpg"},{"replys":[{"reply_author":"爱吃糖果的琪琪","reply_content":"现在还有活动吗，是在支付宝的校园生活里面看吗","reply_publish_time":"1495435440","reply_author_avatar":"https://p1.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/d6a5d43d874a7c70898277a27b3ac91f1099.jpg"},{"reply_author":"dpuser_8522494138","reply_content":"现在还有活动吗？","reply_publish_time":"1494223380","reply_author_avatar":"https://p0.meituan.net/userheadpic/peach.png"},{"reply_author":"可是我还没吃饱","reply_content":"支付宝的活动","reply_publish_time":"1493966520","reply_author_avatar":"https://p0.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/74606b49436f393a93ccb20cf27ca5cd319024.jpg"},{"reply_author":"下雨天的夜_3077","reply_content":"怎么弄学生79折","reply_publish_time":"1493894580","reply_author_avatar":"https://p1.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/c258cc0302fc32b556dbff689211d5c01040.jpg"}],"com_type":"","com_level":"50","com_likes":"0","com_menus":["自助调料","虾滑","滑牛肉","秘制羊肉","牛滑","舞面","撒尿牛丸","鸭肠","巴沙鱼"],"com_spend":"","com_stars":"五星","com_author":"可是我还没吃饱","com_photos":["http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/uE7CMVJTJuyC31yX7_fTULykMGK5EY-WprgBbxlf3SmhLC5f0SSJr4dqexDFSz-STYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/KIJT-dfYHiwz79nn5ORuIrMzjD267ofYkDSv4cZ_AoHRKFpYEo6H3OpKaU98Sy8-TYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/HvE6h5K2EY2sz3qdmLVpaO8pYG9407-W9WPu-fdWL7VVVU6wF2bYNPt44c6vLqYkTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/XwgFUXCGtp1-XM7sFLgBXfbisWiAwKntbjXnzf8sZHW1oo9IaTilO-QeTxH8qvI8TYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/GPCBZc9zczqsxIoz7hAvl2mQsfy7Bbzdn8waGuv-Ha7EWz-wsUVvVdRULWYkSDSzTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg"],"com_replys":"4","com_content":"自从发现学生79折，对海底捞真是越来越爱了……恨不得每天都可以吃吃吃。吉利大厦这家永远都在排队…然而并不能浇灭大家的热情，喜欢笋，虾滑，牛肉也不错，尝试了一下贝滑，也很惊喜！锅底喜欢番茄，其他的没有什么感觉。服务一级棒，头绳，手机袋，各种服务。小料也喜欢，尤其那个泡菜简直了太好吃。还有爆米花爆米花爆米花，简直是不带不是中国人……","main_note_id":"345637341","com_author_id":"62228579","com_contributes":"2000-4999","com_publish_time":"1493568000","com_author_avatar":"https://p0.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/74606b49436f393a93ccb20cf27ca5cd319024.jpg"},{"replys":[],"com_type":"","com_level":"30","com_likes":"2","com_menus":[],"com_spend":"","com_stars":"五星","com_author":"小花不卖萌.","com_photos":["http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/0HcbGc1ilzAmec5YEYabMQCBorym-7Qi8LuBZ3Wc8A-Tfv6TluQIfNN2hTAqQ18vTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/t_rJvwTz5j7agihkC1z5hD1yHVApSUMOE03h0RkwJ4mOS9KTf3d-j_wdvfcJFGnLTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/b3IA9ESbsiiw1Puv6ldBTv9ZfU4sAadel0rzFzsiH5frnnpZez_AhVhqWF73PBr4TYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/oCCYAJyNO5wltODXIGd9d4Z9m_p5bKIWhA9KU0NfVn3EWz-wsUVvVdRULWYkSDSzTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/8h38lkYGhum5ixYh1H13ksiw2ags0KQLzhw0ur2RCPvNFX7pQTAWC7FL0KHr0AgzTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg"],"com_replys":"0","com_content":"每次来海底捞，一定要给服务一个大写特写的点赞与好评！所有的服务员都面带笑容，看到他们的笑容，自己也会变得特别开心。只要你想要的服务，基本都能满足。?
地址在：天津市和平区南京路吉利大厦六层，商场侧面直梯直达。?
等位：下午五点多弟弟先去占座，第20桌，排队大概等了一个小时，坐外面会有小吃和五子棋，妙脆角和玉米粒蛮好吃，服务员给我加了好几次。大家对排队真的太执着，快九点吃完出来，依然很多人在排队。?
菜品?：这次还是点了牛油（减辣）+菌汤（加浓），牛油锅底到后来也是越煮越辣，后来让服务员捞走了辣椒，整体好了很多。点了秘制牛肉、秘制羊肉卷，舞面，牛肉真的可以一直煮到老，无刺龙利鱼片尤为推荐。点的配菜，每个都很好吃。海底捞整体味道就是别家火锅更好吃啊！自助小料的牛肉粒，麻辣海带丝，竹笋不能更棒！我是海底捞忠实粉儿~~????","main_note_id":"343199846","com_author_id":"42371840","com_contributes":"200-399","com_publish_time":"1492358400","com_author_avatar":"https://p0.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/5e954ebadd36bbd429b02fabd7110c9d272915.jpg"},{"replys":[],"com_type":"","com_level":"45","com_likes":"1","com_menus":["脑花"],"com_spend":"￥100","com_stars":"五星","com_author":"小资囡囡","com_photos":["http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/iCl_GqpVzSVJThv0EBJfqi-kUVU7jPDnPOpu8xYxmsfxuwTZJkFZTzgJqRAL1E5dTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/lIs7S56Q-xYNma0hrCxEEQjTG6744CHIQxzXJcYmgDPwL1x2rL0irjObX8s7CRNdTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/xtkl8QkS13-QjbDThqxW17-s_N2bCSuloSG6Ag5PDOlTHnprgj5JQnRdSUJp8DymTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg"],"com_replys":"0","com_content":"就怕等座，提前一天电话订座，我定的是周六中午2位，因为最晚留到11点半，那就定的11点半。11点10分我们就到了，已经开始有拿号的了，报了手机号和姓名顺利坐在座位上了。辣旋风+番茄双拼锅、秘制牛肉、虾滑、玉米、宽粉、脑花、龙利鱼、生菜、一根抻面，除了面都要的半份，我和麻麻足够吃啦。辣旋风要的无渣的，但后厨上来的并不是无渣的，找了服务员，她说不是她点的餐不太清楚，但说给换一份。玉米煮的很好吃，龙利鱼麻麻很喜欢，我更喜欢脑花。在评论中看到会有大娃娃免费提供玩，询问服务员说可以帮我去看看还有没有，不一会就抱来了KT小姐，哈哈！皂片拍起！但我发现个问题，天津的海底捞不是所有菜品都统一价，就拿拼锅来说吧，我在新开路店也是点了这两个口味的拼锅，但那边是78，这里是80多。呵呵！虽然差不了多少钱，但还是觉得统一的好，你们的服务做的这么好，干嘛在价格统一上这点小事有疏忽呢。","main_note_id":"345822874","com_author_id":"7910379","com_contributes":"1000-1999","com_publish_time":"1493654400","com_author_avatar":"https://p1.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/5a743414698b71a4674913c10f294a4a109447.jpg"},{"replys":[],"com_type":"","com_level":"30","com_likes":"2","com_menus":[],"com_spend":"","com_stars":"五星","com_author":"mengyouwawa2","com_photos":["http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/tD8jeXfzgPHgJnYRFFGIUuCv1fAASn232dOoEq3vliB-NpRbr0UwQ7niAIDwKWOCTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/nnk1rxJ8dKumm8_4mj4lUIVT-MxGhNF4wOORQmSaiH9K95HNQHJi6Sh0st47ApZaTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/gZj3Phxu6caxqtC6ktPM_TymDEwFWUtmyy41T9egiTOROBY0eCgHe76uXOER_2DPTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/SEA9PeMyQa-aUMrHwTZACOGm4Sg3FKfyp3rd8iQklLtKoLK0EUv3isUhT-W-zYzZTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/DYm74vbFqBk35Ugxbam7M35tJ8DmL3aFfj57KFjRm5JouI64PLnDNyiI08ZHM8ZfTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg"],"com_replys":"0","com_content":"朋友即将出发去欧洲，提议最想吃的还是以服务著称的海底捞，提前在网上拿了预约排号，下班就直接赶到了吉利大厦，由于是小长假前夜马路上有些堵，不过还是在七点多到了这里，除了电梯才发现乌央乌央的人在等位置，不下百人的阵势也是没谁了，不过服务员井然有序的安排等位座椅，让大家坐下来喝着冰镇酸梅汤，还有奶油玉米粒以及最酥脆的三角酥，吃得口干了还有荷兰小黄瓜和圣女果去火解腻，真的是细致入微！大概等了半个小时才到我们提前约好的号被服务员带了进去，刚坐下来手拿竹筐的服务员就笑着走过来递上了热毛巾给我们擦手，很贴心的把围裙送到我们手中，还有最营养的五谷豆浆，等了那么久却是口干舌燥了，由于我们都不大能吃辣所以点了菌汤和豆花海鲜汤底双拼，配菜以海鲜滑类为主，（因为我们不吃羊肉）配了西式滑牛肉和辣牛柳，蔬菜也是少许点了一些，上菜速度非常快，不到十分钟全都上齐，值得推荐的是他家的调料台，各种调料一应具全，滑类蘸料是单独配好的，还有豆花蘸酱超赞的麻辣鲜香！时令水果也备有伊丽莎白和甜橙外加水果黄瓜还有圣女果，还特别准备了营养粥，总之从点滴细节可以看出来海底捞的经营里充满了服务细节，每一个服务员都训练有素，面带微笑，很具感染力哦！就是有一个不太好的地方，吃完每根头发丝都是火锅味！哈哈","main_note_id":"340887973","com_author_id":"7304655","com_contributes":"200-399","com_publish_time":"1491148800","com_author_avatar":"https://p0.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/6115ff34d4e4c38b1971f1dc0e0f33025960.jpg"},{"replys":[],"com_type":"","com_level":"60","com_likes":"0","com_menus":[],"com_spend":"","com_stars":"四星","com_author":"吃生鱼片的猫","com_photos":["http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/VOs6u0S1g1fm1XcFHOQ6yPKqiWAPXXZr4_qMxKOast4iwrBb5QDLn8whC_rzgH4hTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/-XasegarSaMVRgBfgpTIM7mX_MghSVJVulyqST5ZfIy5W3VhnGSI_cVNypvk8mxtTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/Gtwij4LuMU1RjkfyR4FFoW_LqSmFXJBihBYrRRbiXr5dl2PSGM1_kJwSN2GQRCDrTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/7GjEu3XFXzmS_hBhJyjyywGvdpbYkIOHuReKwRiEnJsBHEaTisKnoeeNUGMg1pLETYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/MLzsTpg_0k8zGkaPiOkuWkfcFPXbrLFmuycZNiIU9FY-qWei53Gil9abJGGAXOm_TYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg"],"com_replys":"0","com_content":"口味还可以，点的清油麻辣、番茄、海鲜豆花、菌汤的，海鲜豆花里面的豆花也可以吃。选喝的海鲜豆花、菌汤的还不错?捞派毛肚还不错?一定要吃辣的。红皮土豆也很好吃哦。最爱的还是竹荪好吃?煮在番茄锅里。蛋炒饭虽然等了很久，不过煎蛋?一上来就是溏心的，两份蛋炒饭一开始就只给加了一份?后来又找的时候居然以为我们给吃了。服务态度感觉一般。","main_note_id":"346447433","com_author_id":"139177151","com_contributes":"5000以上","com_publish_time":"1494000000","com_author_avatar":"https://p1.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/fe4cace6f77d5a24724aab61630c1e3b89400.jpg"},{"replys":[],"com_type":"","com_level":"40","com_likes":"0","com_menus":[],"com_spend":"","com_stars":"五星","com_author":"小梦悠悠","com_photos":["http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/5WKlvu8XBXDo4Tm-kUmUH6ZSeF-mCQoTpRjiLfSR58VmE5cTlkEghg4rwc6lZ2zyTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/ejny2_2cMgXe8FZOSBNhgWkhyt1Fj4EjNx7RaphPRTS20MwiZ1PnhLkFQaLXTOXwTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/ATS-Vvy2nX0-A-vkXMWMoOwfvyMlIlUOMfvODBfW_XEwzm9uveChERRGdodKlwFcTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/Go2Qwvjwyl_5U89alZwuRSrcwP5Keh0tysYBAVajE6JrjHK-JpY4ZtxkDze9M5gDTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg"],"com_replys":"0","com_content":"生日这天和老公不知道吃啥就来到海底捞就餐的人依旧人山人海等了大约四十多分钟吃点儿小食品玩会儿棋时间过得也还算快
因为都不想吃辣就要的番茄和海鲜鸳鸯锅这两个锅底味道都很好九元一份的自助小料很不错喜欢里面的牛肉粒最喜欢的是虾滑牛羊肉质很不错黑豆浆中规中矩吧服务肯定没的说就是把赠送我的长寿面忘记了不过也已经吃饱了就没再提醒服务员","main_note_id":"347454453","com_author_id":"22896219","com_contributes":"400-999","com_publish_time":"1494518400","com_author_avatar":"https://p1.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/f12bd894c639f78afc473e60593c5ed117513.jpg"},{"replys":[],"com_type":"","com_level":"40","com_likes":"0","com_menus":["虾滑","鱼豆腐","捞面"],"com_spend":"￥100","com_stars":"五星","com_author":"你若安好便是晴天彤","com_photos":["http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/O6f1zq7GG96QoH0C7PPpkNyLwUr13EpQyXHN4cyNR80csKmuFA0GbGX2sKiTUaZxTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/TDzaNXGSwNOtLw9dGCWOjj4aaN1dlMXlxhlkRTLo5bzJ-JMpgRkYwbGCsposq-WMTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/oedv_BVAs3wzh47h69IBztkdpK5vflKDahGvsVDm26nkNbyrPE9B32GREdOE5uJQTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/l6cZedQklRQfcmHaoth6q2i6zuJBRhmMyxuCywoI7jhF8y9SSCj5PBLbkxBQdMpfTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/R9yQjGonWZ6lhlbyacy1f7NijqgHGcSiUP4fPlnp3agzTSfv2liYsq1ryCXBVUUUTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg"],"com_replys":"0","com_content":"每一次来宾客络绎不绝原因是什么呢我觉得一定是口味好服务佳来过的次数不多每次都是看到门口那一排排的人望而却步离开了其实真心想吃啊番茄汤底可以先喝汤再涮锅一定是我的必点还有我的鱼豆腐这次没有好可惜之前来看别人的餐桌前有人在跳舞感觉很新奇这一次我也点来尝试一下【舞面】我觉得这也算是海底捞的特色了很喜欢这里的服务每个区域都有一位服务员照顾着在这里我想要喝水有人给我斟上就是小料服务员都会帮我拿弄的很不好意思看他们好辛苦啊这服务满满的200分啊","main_note_id":"344100623","com_author_id":"23290604","com_contributes":"400-999","com_publish_time":"1492790400","com_author_avatar":"https://p0.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/aa920d4a02189ccb3bd57c09a99a9df162715.jpg"},{"replys":[],"com_type":"","com_level":"40","com_likes":"0","com_menus":[],"com_spend":"","com_stars":"五星","com_author":"小雨撒浪嘿","com_photos":["http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/al7VwC9WgORD5g8jyEFzeA4wvLT2yPiY2GJwKQJrWFC1oo9IaTilO-QeTxH8qvI8TYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/pq0ffdVmxjZKGenF0UDeJQ2Zh0rLmK4mT64Zz3qH_dJ2RzRjFYhj5njVYekTCwBvTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/Q10RndiaKMOzOF-Dz3ODN2OCXsPiYNbc0NGt09eBgc8EXDLgqdYkbuvgvsPMUAGUTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/PJ2BwmV7md_08RmNiy3lkjQvFZhz7zb70TZUIhYltv8lBq9puvyWwN7oukWr8wwxTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/c2nPEfIthUuaZ1sACLVJ8S0z3_MwIWc9AVcTof5KO4aWTqzeJilPSRAbL6Zqa-DvTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg"],"com_replys":"0","com_content":"1探海底捞，点的是鸳鸯锅，味道不错。因为我们是中午时间过去的，没有排队，听说周六周日人非常多，所以也没能体会到高峰时期排队时的“特别服务”相对夸赞的神乎其神的服务，其味道也还称得上不错，对于一个餐厅而言，无论服务、硬件再好，但倘若味道很差，生命力也是无法长久的。毕竟，人们去了那里，还是为了吃饱吃好，服务则是锦上添花的。刚进门一路上服务员都是微笑的和你很自然的谈着话，带到了一个位置坐下来，我人还没坐定，服务就来了。茶水、水果迅速上桌，喜欢的话，通通可以免费一直续点；脱下的外套，有专人帮你套起来，以免吃完火锅后外衣都是味道；怕吃火锅不慎酱汁沾到衣服，每人发一条围兜，让你不会吃得心惊胆跳。我们就开始点菜了，服务员会告诉你不要点太多，吃不够在点很快的，其实真的这里也没什么很多菜可以点的，不过味道还是非常好的，价格有点贵，但是的确值，最后还点了面，没一会儿一个小伙来给我们现场甩面，穿一身白显的很干净，扯面很欢乐，不过一根8块(好像是)的面条，换来食客的好心情，也值了！之后我们是过生日的还给了我们惊喜，服务真的很好?，很用心，还有很多免费的服务，比如美甲，擦鞋，带小朋友去玩，美甲?的姐姐服务也是很好的，走的时候还玩了会游戏?","main_note_id":"340401825","com_author_id":"720842395","com_contributes":"400-999","com_publish_time":"1490976000","com_author_avatar":"https://p0.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/01363e992f4356137dffe70c738b9b5521046.jpg"},{"replys":[],"com_type":"","com_level":"40","com_likes":"0","com_menus":[],"com_spend":"","com_stars":"五星","com_author":"呵呵哒菇凉","com_photos":["http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/GDFwTtDEs770T1Mx9K2hqU6JvTATvkvaAoDX1F4zVObUiURwWfT9vPdxmK5NZTF8TYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/7lJenNB4azF8y4Uf3OzZB9ESAb0OjKX8tYMide5zpftdo_J2BOAVauavBqpBqhsJTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/rOrFoVF4luBPgNjSC-jo6FbxW9f-SJWCIbJ-2UNa87Bm2cIggjFEH_RcDG1HWAsVTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg"],"com_replys":"0","com_content":"好多年没吃过海底捞了、我记忆中海底捞很贵来着、所以一直提不起兴趣去。这次用了同学的学生证下午去哒。两个人点了三个锅底一个水。番茄锅比想象的要好吃。服务果然不是盖的、服务员太有眼力净了、会告诉你两个人点两个锅底合适、半份半份点餐就够了、没饮料会立马给倒满、只是吃个火锅而已那么热情都不习惯啦！！自助的西瓜不是很甜、鱼皮挺好吃哒。点多了实在吃不了了没上桌的面条还可以退、感觉挺好。价格和董家湾差不多、还是喜欢九宫格、吃的也自在些...","main_note_id":"345373331","com_author_id":"14066145","com_contributes":"400-999","com_publish_time":"1493481600","com_author_avatar":"https://p1.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/d2340e1f970d3cd55c090e581413e5b636101.jpg"},{"replys":[],"com_type":"","com_level":"40","com_likes":"3","com_menus":["虾滑","担担面","捞派毛肚","红薯片","特色豆花","澳洲雪花"],"com_spend":"￥150","com_stars":"五星","com_author":"dd草薰衣","com_photos":["http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/Spj2ywnCCgvSQ5HX0_bqCWBzhhsrg5-f0wQgf3OsOjvMyPRMleaDSP-6WmQuJiv6TYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/G3V6DFmCl4zd4XKUPpbCiFW7kt0RxagLaoGE_f5Rrb5F8y9SSCj5PBLbkxBQdMpfTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/Ca9j9o2QTE_08pGUYvoKWgFMUzO0pQun7daBwV-J_9fJDRY7-AEYtILZt_KuQUlcTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/_haCCTkcFROkc2zLl77qczumcz5_FbZsbZR5S9TH46ViWRr1Oyx9E1Ltd1LLhGf7TYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/KREJrklrfn2_3i1qT6XGcflr6iAR5nB40wNtJu9a8bybBI9M86czpewAp1hb5qoLTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg"],"com_replys":"0","com_content":"人一直都还挺多的，尤其是饭点，基本都要等位，周末节假日什么的等位区都不够用呢，等位时的两种小点心很好吃，尤其是爆米花。感觉每次等位时一直吃吃吃，简直都要饱啦，不过火锅还是不能放弃的。他家菜量还好，都可以点半份很贴心，一般会要鸳鸯锅，清油或者红油麻辣再加豆花海鲜，海鲜那半边汤不错，锅底加辣味道也很足，基本不需要小料。小料台的小菜都很不错，水果种类不多但都很新鲜，品质也很好，哈密瓜尤其甜，小黄瓜也鲜嫩可口。澳洲雪花肉质不错，毛肚也新鲜，百叶时好时坏，其他肉卷都还可以，只要是锅底够味，土豆和红薯片必点，现在的紫皮土豆更好煮一些，捞面不错，不过不是每次都还有余力吃，豌杂面也相当好吃，胜过好多小面。","main_note_id":"340845293","com_author_id":"28734947","com_contributes":"400-999","com_publish_time":"1491148800","com_author_avatar":"https://p1.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/3af2b23cc511976b1d3217af025ba37f4080.jpg"},{"replys":[{"reply_author":"爱吃糖果的琪琪","reply_content":"是在支付宝的校园生活里面看吗？现在还有活动吗","reply_publish_time":"1495435500","reply_author_avatar":"https://p1.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/d6a5d43d874a7c70898277a27b3ac91f1099.jpg"},{"reply_author":"我是逗逗哟","reply_content":"补充一点为什么没有正常的土豆了！！！！红皮土豆好难吃！！！","reply_publish_time":"1492688760","reply_author_avatar":"https://p0.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/d291c1972c34a503394757c0524bb855122855.jpeg"}],"com_type":"","com_level":"40","com_likes":"0","com_menus":["虾滑","自助调料","捞面","血豆腐","龙利鱼","各种滑","牛肉?菌类锅底"],"com_spend":"￥120","com_stars":"五星","com_author":"我是逗逗哟","com_photos":["http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/wWrTNGyxicb_ZxlODAYDwd_-r-facZ4RImKfi4MAn2AkNVqbowOSz6WrD4VBGHSxTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/ddt1OGORyNNZHJINqkpfJXH5_RoaM9A9Bcv1VkNs-IaR-cGlPlGk8jbX_vnKR2oNTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/n2CAEgQ32J8IJdK0quHHS0qzg_QJNWrQpbu-KKKJSpAymZH2c9fscSZZnlltd3NgTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/TltmmdNyBcMb54yoOfdTrhEplCK6yhyYGPdGN6UVT1CR-cGlPlGk8jbX_vnKR2oNTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg"],"com_replys":"2","com_content":"海底捞呀！最爱！必须是全五星！
服务是公认的，没的说！
每次都是菌类加上牛油锅底，牛油是我认为最接近重庆当地味道的，比董家湾之类的都好！
鸭肠黄喉之类的都有点吃腻了，这次没点。
蟹肉棒，鱼片，油豆皮，羊肉，牛肉，千层肚，鱿鱼须，虾滑。嘻嘻都是最爱，鱿鱼须是第一次点，特别新鲜，都是一整块鱿鱼须吃的特别过瘾，强烈推荐，下次还会点。捞面也是必点！
学生证还打7.9折，折后才209开心！快毕业了，马上就要用不了了?
还能再爱一百年！","main_note_id":"343693934","com_author_id":"777902581","com_contributes":"400-999","com_publish_time":"1492617600","com_author_avatar":"https://p0.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/d291c1972c34a503394757c0524bb855122855.jpeg"},{"replys":[],"com_type":"","com_level":"10","com_likes":"0","com_menus":["鲜贝滑","四格锅底","番茄锅底"],"com_spend":"￥108","com_stars":"五星","com_author":"bunnysmile7","com_photos":["http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/8s8D78G_fhV-4-EPt86Nxr6vZoh2hgVlQyiJIfeMedj97R5AhAw_sYX_39idGaAqTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/unWmLHbuY5-03hf-yhpYSaNBc6Vo9EFJekC9n2_LzG6rnsvp1MOdwQvHn5zjkUSRTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/FH6T_RA5QxNPkZGty7nNoGDJ1fK_ksrG4fobib8689V6X-SGifYn7dkErBNhKP0ATYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg"],"com_replys":"0","com_content":"提前一天预订了座位，到的时候基本没等。海底捞的服务好是出了名的，吉利大厦这家服务格外好，刚坐下就会提醒你带围裙，还会递皮筋，因为穿了白衣服还给了袖套，随叫随到，捞菜的时候因为土豆丢进去找不到了，一个小哥哥就过来帮我捞，好贴心哇～锅底点了四宫格，番茄的味道很棒！之前都吃三鲜，没想到番茄的这么好吃！男票喜欢极了，只涮番茄的。菌汤锅是想喝汤，每次都能喝好几碗～吃不了辣还离不开辣，所以还点了一个清水的，煮完涮一涮～嫩牛肉味道很好，量也挺大。之前都是吃虾滑，这次点了贝滑竟然也很好吃～鱼饼也不错，Q弹～红皮土豆是因为好奇点的，口感倒是跟土豆没啥区别。冻豆腐吃火锅必不可少啊～玉米是男票最爱，有玉米可以不要主食哈哈～水果也很丰富，有西瓜蜜瓜小番茄黄瓜～总之每次来吃都很开心！这次错过了建行信用卡满200减60的活动，有点小难过哇，希望以后有多多的活动！","main_note_id":"347048615","com_author_id":"50214430","com_contributes":"50-99","com_publish_time":"1494259200","com_author_avatar":"https://p0.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/95ac07026fe7bc9b06870435b964de8157944.jpg"},{"replys":[],"com_type":"","com_level":"40","com_likes":"1","com_menus":["滑牛肉","捞面","鲜虾滑","澳洲肥牛","密制滑牛肉","仙贝滑"],"com_spend":"￥200","com_stars":"五星","com_author":"梦小姐的梦","com_photos":["http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/pro6XTfLAu-CLPSnuMoQGCeXwwcbAJjzM81dVuDnlV3DO0P3XwjXE2b786aP6Pq4TYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/p29qL9eluZ3HgUg5L3WBZ9Ziup1nVlwKTFWjRUMwpJ3A2133JmxyoJVxRUYtLPhXTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/piEQ9ZhZpzUmm6Cp-zex-IsXP5q4hWa4JlriTqSnwmorvkHyMac7eaNrOOmvIgmcTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/VcD0SsxsxizWAOOoBiiCHm9_kjF0Ug9wbqfk0YQuYvF6lo_kpsFhbNx1yHyVDqGrTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/wYfH-Jvl8GeSHMdsibxhBk0ek1FNh8sxuYff7v2ll1AzTSfv2liYsq1ryCXBVUUUTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg"],"com_replys":"0","com_content":"第一次来吉利大厦店，晚上快十点了依然很火爆，居然等位等了将近一个小时，真的是……不过不得不说从等位到用餐服务真的是特别周到，每次吃都是这样无论是在哪个分店，非常细节的地方都能想得到！说下菜品，蔬菜确实很新鲜，根本看不到坏的地方，肉刚下锅就老了，这是以前从来都没有过得，很难理解这个问题，扇贝和虾滑真的不错，从外观到口感都非常赞！总体不错，不过味道偏淡，个人口感问题！","main_note_id":"341627907","com_author_id":"20778551","com_contributes":"400-999","com_publish_time":"1491494400","com_author_avatar":"https://p0.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/9f9235adeb0319b038bb0b0fcb9651fe24621.jpg"},{"replys":[{"reply_author":"dpuser_6689428627","reply_content":"我","reply_publish_time":"1491198720","reply_author_avatar":"https://p0.meituan.net/userheadpic/cupcake.png"}],"com_type":"","com_level":"50","com_likes":"3","com_menus":[],"com_spend":"","com_stars":"五星","com_author":"吃出来的友情最牢固","com_photos":["http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/4SFENS1HYjA6Wsf_Awnd2gHUDGI7jk0vtR61-AJHtHhiWRr1Oyx9E1Ltd1LLhGf7TYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/EEvNivIoB3tc8meM9hFWX6tV9tsn7khJ8kDf0NDOhD9l4jazCKjwcTmk2BzyUGKZTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/mhm-976WwqEJgqsoaMniJhrQu3FN14j6cYFhLFoAcoFm2cIggjFEH_RcDG1HWAsVTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/rcKeUFWJgWpkvRbFF4QK0-acp51w_qJNsJdjq6ZIcgAKBGUvIOB95YA_mTXZf91STYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/THse2AUf4fvgRl2weECCwGWkJPjBkq8IYLnwvwi7aBIL5cDiWTZSCIAlwaWQCVeYTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg"],"com_replys":"1","com_content":"感觉近期大部分活动都会选择这里。交通方便，味道服务好，价格合适应该是总体评价吧。基本每次都能预定上单间非常不错，单价大概加88元就可以，有了私密空间，大家可以闲聊非常好，而且单间会有特殊的水果和坚果等等赠送很超值。服务员非常友善，从进屋之后帮大家挂衣服，到点餐，劝大家不要点过多等等，都有善意的提醒。味道也很好，近期喜欢秘制牛肉和秘制羊肉，服务员说这个属于越煮越嫩的肉，很好吃。其他无论鲜羊肉还是牛肉都好吃。这里蔬菜种类也很多，应有尽有。扯面很有意思，会有人给表演抻面，可选粗细，味道也不错。另外小料种类多可选的也很多，小菜和水果也很丰富。饮料可以选豆浆和酸梅汤还有柠檬水。","main_note_id":"337183649","com_author_id":"3304125","com_contributes":"2000-4999","com_publish_time":"1489248000","com_author_avatar":"https://p1.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/562ead7fc4f294bcb6af037f00c4c1911175.jpg"},{"replys":[{"reply_author":"胖晶121","reply_content":"哈哈，好吧，是有一些凑字的嫌疑?","reply_publish_time":"1495250100","reply_author_avatar":"https://p0.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/bdc663935dfb4aea2ce42a1a8dd381ec51933.jpg"},{"reply_author":"一曲折扇情！！！！","reply_content":"没有，是很逗??","reply_publish_time":"1495250100","reply_author_avatar":"https://p0.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/676bd447079d09ddc7c4a4aaf83e351e20739.jpg"},{"reply_author":"胖晶121","reply_content":"咋了，是感觉很敷衍吗","reply_publish_time":"1495249380","reply_author_avatar":"https://p0.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/bdc663935dfb4aea2ce42a1a8dd381ec51933.jpg"},{"reply_author":"一曲折扇情！！！！","reply_content":"你这评论我服","reply_publish_time":"1495248660","reply_author_avatar":"https://p0.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/676bd447079d09ddc7c4a4aaf83e351e20739.jpg"}],"com_type":"","com_level":"40","com_likes":"1","com_menus":["虾滑","自助调料","滑牛肉","肥牛","番茄锅","山药","炸馒头"],"com_spend":"￥100","com_stars":"四星","com_author":"胖晶121","com_photos":["http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/PtiZ1fRqXqSjXagMs22TmIFwb9FRsySbEbH3d_MGAlwiwrBb5QDLn8whC_rzgH4hTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/3r3St_d-AZ3brrAdcGWXWmDZPkj3bNXFLisHIXs7wr9E2k994TWKx5W8RXChA9BGTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/xtKN6UbhUCvVxRSz49nqnf8TZl_RWXrJfC8h9eTZCAZmE5cTlkEghg4rwc6lZ2zyTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg"],"com_replys":"4","com_content":"地方好找，吉利大厦6层，跟闺蜜逛街累了，直奔以服务好著称的海底捞！?
就两个人，要了鸳鸯锅，番茄锅拼菌汤，半份虾滑，半份秘制牛肉，半份肥牛，半份杏鲍菇，半份大白菜，半份蟹棒，半份茼蒿，整份山药，小料2人份，饮料畅饮5元/人（大概是包括柠檬水、酸梅汤等），最后结账217元，也不算很贵啦，因为锅底就78元！?
再来说说服务，真的很周到，有时让人感觉心忙，大概是企业的服务理念吧?","main_note_id":"345968737","com_author_id":"25417587","com_contributes":"400-999","com_publish_time":"1493740800","com_author_avatar":"https://p0.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/bdc663935dfb4aea2ce42a1a8dd381ec51933.jpg"},{"replys":[],"com_type":"","com_level":"20","com_likes":"2","com_menus":[],"com_spend":"","com_stars":"五星","com_author":"dpuser_03030148028","com_photos":["http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/RpzoK1wWs_PTvyASsZda32P15hHpikAX9AeaRERMBi-20MwiZ1PnhLkFQaLXTOXwTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/2ZmzCLIk354lfIKRv1FBqyoQ4YAebnzDmGvtuSrafsQHIIYCImeUL8aBD6VXyEwMTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/Vxvp2aw27XkzOG_B3UsMF-4XsTclbdDis7VFmDUAlpKlmg_HyTBMoAUrtPs9YqWsTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/0E6RzKDyZKS4t1ZIM-SiAVnt5l7hqauebk3tnLGhsaAHo8itsBkcmVncTI8kIYxjTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg","http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/ia6rJkhdFOVarMxomoHqTlP30ppuqGwU5Y0f65T89T6bQ3QAyS5ZgqVDp-olAAnOTYGVDmosZWTLal1WbWRW3A.jpg"],"com_replys":"0","com_content":"周四工作日，中午不等位，四个人，一进去被笑脸包围。服务细致：头绳、手机套、围裙、装外套、卫生间递纸、美甲、偶尔帮忙涮，给相应小料，及时添饮料等...
第一次来，所以四个锅底：番茄：酸所以不腻，四人评选第一。海鲜豆捞：清鲜的味道，衬托食材本身味道。菌菇：比外面的浓一点，不错。清油麻辣：吃不了辣的人点的放飞梦想，可以@.@
肉类：特制牛羊肉点赞，更爱吃牛肉，口感厚实没谁了。黄喉：口感有嚼劲，神奇。鸭肠：看推荐所以期望值过高，平常心吃味道可以，脆。猪脑：爱脑人士必点，爽！虾滑：个人觉得一般。
菜品：最爱红薯，甜爆了；红皮土豆好吃；水晶粉，比粉丝粗，比面条细好吃好吃！！个人对藕、木耳、白萝卜一般、不过舍友爱惨白萝卜?
自助区：水果哈密瓜圣女果橙子，质量都很好；沙拉凉菜黄瓜海带丝绝配火锅；小料值得一提牛肉粒，放里面good～
吃饭中也是可以美甲的?，预约一下即可，单色无饰品，涂得很好无甲醛味道。最后舍友说了句糖好好吃，败家服务员捧了一把，吃了一路开心?","main_note_id":"339016287","com_author_id":"776392142","com_contributes":"100-199","com_publish_time":"1490198400","com_author_avatar":"https://p1.meituan.net/userheadpicbackend/c6cf76be9f8e585492bbab180e01a30f3100.jpg"},{"replys":[],"com_type":"","com_level":"30","com_likes":"0","com_menus":[],"com_spend":"","com_stars":"五星","com_author":"爱上萌萌哒的微安","com_photos":["http://qcloud.dpfile.com/pc/AF04of4AIc7SvCYUH7uB-eRG00mPneLKulg68NOF8bKNJJyLrOQU-SMeLn0eUv76TYGVDm
